name: Obtain The Grain
description:
Have you ever felt a need to get as much bread as humanly possible? Obtain The Grain is an RPG where you are tasked with getting that bread. It won't be an easy trip however as hostile Karen's lurk around. Engage in turn based combat with anyone who seeks to stop you. 

If you want to see more about Obtain The Grain or other games I've worked on please check out my portfolio at https://www.samlower.net/
